errors.error_description: The README specifies 'Python 3+' which is too broad and may cause users to attempt installation with incompatible older Python 3 versions. The package requires Python 3.8 or newer.
correction_candidates: MiV-OS is compatible with the latest version of Python.

errors.error_description: The installation command `pip install miv_os` is incorrect. The package name on PyPI uses a hyphen (MiV-OS), not an underscore.
The installation instructions unnecessarily ask the user to manually install `numpy`. `numpy` is a dependency of MiV-OS and will be installed automatically by pip.
correction_candidates: Remove the line `$ pip install numpy`.
Add `scipy` to the manual installation: `$ pip install numpy scipy`.
Move the `$ pip install numpy` command after `$ pip install MiV-OS`.
Specify a version for numpy: `$ pip install numpy==1.21.0`.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the line `$ pip install numpy`.

errors.error_description: The link to the contribution guideline points to `docs/CONTRIBUTING.md`, but the file is located in the root directory of the repository.
correction_candidates: Change the link path to the full GitHub URL for the file.
